Name: King of the Savage Realms
About the game: Train units, gather resources, build up defenses, launch your attacks. King of the Savage Realms is a real-time single-player resource / defense game. Advance your max build level by destroying enemies to gain access to stronger structures. Each Scenario features a new environment and enemy type. Enemies are spawned from camps on either side of your territory. Eliminate the camps (and all spawned enemies) to end the raids and conquer the Scenario. There are a total of 4 full Scenarios included in the game. The Blacksmith has various tech upgrades to purchase, increasing your unit effectiveness. It also allows the building of more hardened combat units: Swordsman and Spearman. Player-Color Selection affecting UI and Unit colors, Configurable in-game help system, a very simple tutorial for new players, control mapping, and multi-language interface.
